alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 03 at 1:58PM PDT until April 04 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...South to southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Generally the higher terrain of Douglas, Josephine, and Eastern Curry Counties, including Sexton Pass on Interstate 5 and foothills. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds are expected in the high terrain, but occasional gusty winds are possible the Umpqua and Illinois Valleys. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills
